img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 53.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/41/Wukong_YellowFlower_53.jpg)
If his stance moves into holding both swords up high, he'll perform a similar combo string of four quick hits, followed by twirling both blades around him as moves forward to perform a final double slash that hits extremely hard -- again, making staying out of range your best bet.
img_below_text:
His hardest hitting attack will come when he swaps to a reverse grip with his left sword, before dashing close to unleash three quick hits before flipping high into the air and slamming down for his "Flood of Blood" attack. Watch out for when he lands, as he'll also perform a last sweeping attack as he reorients himself.
![Wukong YellowFlower 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_YellowFlower_50.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 53.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/41/Wukong_YellowFlower_53.jpg)
If his stance moves into holding both swords up high, he'll perform a similar combo string of four quick hits, followed by twirling both blades around him as moves forward to perform a final double slash that hits extremely hard -- again, making staying out of range your best bet."
        - Following Text: "His hardest hitting attack will come when he swaps to a reverse grip with his left sword, before dashing close to unleash three quick hits before flipping high into the air and slamming down for his "Flood of Blood" attack. Watch out for when he lands, as he'll also perform a last sweeping attack as he reorients himself.
![Wukong YellowFlower 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_YellowFlower_50.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character engaged in a battle with an enemy named "Venom Daoist." The enemy is mid-attack, wielding dual swords, with a dynamic visual effect highlighting the motion and impact of the strike. The health bar at the bottom indicates the enemy's name and remaining health, while the HUD displays the player's abilities and resources. This moment aligns with the guide's description of the Venom Daoist's powerful combo attacks, emphasizing the need for strategic positioning to avoid heavy damage.
